event_text: The apprentices of the Clan are taking special training to learn how to land on enemies when jumping from trees.

As a storm rages and the branches of the forest whip around outside, m_c is tucked up in the healers' den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.

As a storm rages and the branches of the forest whip around outside, m_c is tucked up in the elders' den, {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} sleep anything but restful. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/keep/keeps} seeing flashes of prophecy_list_sight. {PRONOUN/m_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/m_c/wake/wakes} with a shiver, wondering what {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} dreams mean for the Clan.

The things {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} saw today, omen_list_sight... m_c conceals {PRONOUN/m_c/self} in a hidden alcove under branches that drip all the way to the ground, needing privacy as {PRONOUN/m_c/subject} {VERB/m_c/consider/considers} what these new omens foretell.

Like a seed just beginning to sprout, m_c is now on {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} journey to becoming a full warrior of c_n. With a proud gaze, r_c presents {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} kit with acc_singular. r_c knows that one day m_c will grow big and strong, just like a little seed can grow into a strong tree.
m_c is such a fungi to be around!

A small flock of birds have decided to start frequenting the branches high above camp and, much to the annoyance of most, have dropped plenty of feathers everywhere as they preen. m_c thinks they're pretty though, and decides to keep some.
